ca.mcgill.ecse211.final_project_beta1.Localizer

Class UltrasonicLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.final_project_beta1.Localizer.UltrasonicLocalizer

  • public class UltrasonicLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses ultrasonic sensor to correct the angle of the robot.
    Author:
    Xiangyun Wang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static double angle1
      Direction of the robot when first time detecting a wall
      (package private) static double angle2
      Direction of the robot when second time detecting a wall
      private static int filterControl
      Counter for detecting long distance
      private static int filterOut
      Threshold for detecting long distance
      private static float lastDistance
      The previous distance got from ultrasonic sensor
      (package private) static boolean need_extra 
      private static int ROTATE_SPEED
      Speed of rotation while doing the localization

      Constructor and Description
      UltrasonicLocalizer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static int convertAngle(double radius, double width, double angle)
      This method take the radius of wheels, width of the robot and the angle needs to be rotated by the robot, to calculate the rotation needs to make by wheels to turn a certain angle to a certain direction
      private static int convertDistance(double radius, double distance)
      This method takes the radius of wheels and the distance that needs to be traveled, and calculate the rotation of the wheels need to make to travel that distance
      static void fallingEdge()
      The method falling Edge is used when the robot is NOT facing the wall.
      static float getData()
      The method getData gets the distance from ultrasonic sensor
      static void turnTo(double theta)
      This method allows us to get the minimum angle and turn to it so that our robot can travel to the next point by doing the difference between theta and the current angle

    • Method Detail

      • fallingEdge

        public static void fallingEdge()
                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        The method falling Edge is used when the robot is NOT facing the wall. In that case, it will check for a reduction of distance and sweep for angle
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getData

        public static float getData()
        The method getData gets the distance from ultrasonic sensor
        Returns:
        result data from the ultrasonic sensor

      • turnTo

        public static void turnTo(double theta)
        This method allows us to get the minimum angle and turn to it so that our robot can travel to the next point by doing the difference between theta and the current angle
        Parameters:
        theta - target direction

      • convertAngle

        private static int convertAngle(double radius,
                                double width,
                                double angle)
        This method take the radius of wheels, width of the robot and the angle needs to be rotated by the robot, to calculate the rotation needs to make by wheels to turn a certain angle to a certain direction
        Parameters:
        radius - is the radius of wheels
        width - is the width of the robot
        angle - is the angle needs to be turned by the robot
        Returns:
        rotation of wheels

      • convertDistance

        private static int convertDistance(double radius,
                                   double distance)
        This method takes the radius of wheels and the distance that needs to be traveled, and calculate the rotation of the wheels need to make to travel that distance
        Parameters:
        radius - is the wheel radius
        distance - is the distance needs to be traveled
        Returns:
        rotation of the wheels
